item.description:
Open Studio -- come and chill out and work on your own projects at your own pace. I won't be there until our 3 p.m. start time, but if other Studio members can be there earlier, we'll start before 3. I expect to be there well into the evening, so if you'd like to come later in the day, that's fine too.

Watch this space for updates, and see the description on the first page of the message board for details.

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: Open Studio at ArtStudio 360 in Holliston
